Package pl.lib.model

Class Column

java.lang.Object
pl.lib.model.Column
public final class Column extends Object
Represents a column in a report with its properties and calculations.

This class defines a single column in the report including field mapping, display properties, formatting options, and calculation settings for both group and report levels.

Usage example:


 Column priceColumn = new Column(
     "price",                    // field name in data source
     "Product Price",           // column header
     120,                       // column width in pixels
     DataType.BIG_DECIMAL,      // data type
     "#,##0.00 $",             // formatting pattern
     Calculation.SUM,           // report-level calculation
     Calculation.AVERAGE,       // group-level calculation
     "numericStyle"             // style name
 );
Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Column

      public Column()
      Default constructor for JSON deserialization.

    • Column

      public Column(String fieldName, String title, int width, DataType type, String pattern, Calculation reportCalculation, Calculation groupCalculation, String styleName, boolean hasBox)
      Creates a new Column with all properties including box setting.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - name of the field in data source
      title - column header text
      width - column width in pixels
      type - data type for the column
      pattern - formatting pattern (e.g., "#,##0.00" for numbers)
      reportCalculation - calculation to perform at report level
      groupCalculation - calculation to perform at group level
      styleName - name of the style to apply
      hasBox - whether column should have border box

    • Column

      public Column(String fieldName, String title, int width, DataType type, String pattern, Calculation reportCalculation, Calculation groupCalculation, String styleName)
      Creates a new Column with default box setting (no box).
      Parameters:
      fieldName - name of the field in data source
      title - column header text
      width - column width in pixels
      type - data type for the column
      pattern - formatting pattern (e.g., "#,##0.00" for numbers)
      reportCalculation - calculation to perform at report level
      groupCalculation - calculation to perform at group level
      styleName - name of the style to apply
